ygData.subject: Re: Denons Disruptive Discord
ygData.msgSnippet: Last time I checked Denon s, back at 42nd when I got Berzerker (another brass song, attack speed, ac, and strength increase), it was doing 28 per TICK (5
ygData.messageBody:
Last time I checked Denon's, back at 42nd when I got Berzerker (another
brass song, attack speed, ac, and strength increase), it was doing 28 per
TICK (5 seconds) with a horn, and 14 without. AC drop was 10/5. Song
duration is three ticks, so that adds up to 84 damage. Seems to go up one
point of damage every two levels. At 24th, it was doing half that damage,
btw. So that 21st level bard is very mistaken.

The best DoT song we have, Chords of Cessation, does 40 points per tick at
48th level, with a lute, and drops attack speed the same amount Melodic
Binding does.


----- Original Message -----
From: Rokenn of Karana <rokenn@...>

Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 10:58 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Denons Disruptive Discord


>From: Rokenn of Karana <rokenn@...>

>Rokenn Swiftsong

>Karana Server

>>I'm an 18th level Bard on CZ. I was just curious if anybody had specific
>>stats on the damage done using Denons Disruptive Cord. Also, does the
>>damage inflicted increase with your level, your brass skill or both. I
>>overheard a 21 level bard say that she does 79 hp worth of damage with
>>this song per pulse when using her horn. I failed to ask her how she
>>arrived at this figure, but now that I have the song (which does work
>>pretty good), I wish I had. Anybody have the answer to this?
>>
>>Galaline
>>Cazic-Thule
